resources.string: Make sure you have your GPS on and an active connection to the Internet.
Challenge app from Nutrium to Nuno Aguiar.

This app shows open restaurants near you.

Touch to open the restaurant's location in your GPS navigator.
Longpress to add/remove to favourites.
You don\'t have access to the Internet or there aren\'t restaurants nearby.
Failed to get location. Please make sure you have the GPS turned on.
